content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about this Notice, you should contact the Company's data protection officer, Yuriy Goliyad â€“ Head of Global Operations, can be contacted:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By email: privacy@epam.com \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By phone (mobile): +1 732 735 6459 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Skype for business: see internal directory\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-bidi-font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]}]}}"
